subject: Hello
body:
Hello
We wish to urgently confirm from you if actually you know one Mrs. Gladys Frank  who claims to be your business associate / partner. Kindly reconfirm this application put in by Mrs. Gladys Frank - she submitted the under listed bank account information supposedly sent by you to receive the funds on your behalf.
The bank information she applied with are stated thus:
Account Name: Mrs. Gladys Frank
Bank name: Citi Bank NA
Bank address: #1230 Arch Street, Philadelphia, PA 19107, USA
Account Number: 013439887655
Routing Number: 2771722
Swift Code: CITIUS30
The said Mrs. Gladys Frank is claiming to this office that you are very sick laying in the hospital and have Instructed that all relevant documentation Information regarding your Payment be changed to her as the beneficiary of your payment.
We advise you contact the paying Bank with bellow information:
Metro International Bank Of America
Tele: +19093785876
metrobk1@yahoo.com
Your quick response will help us a lot.
Best Regards,
Mr. Emma Odera
+968487663

subject: Re:   Hello
body:
Hello Mr. Emma Odera,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall having any business dealings with a Mrs. Gladys Frank. Could you please provide more details about the nature of the business she claims we are involved in? 

Also, I'm not currently in the hospital or sick as she seems to have informed you. It's strange that she would say such a thing.

I look forward to your response and clarification on this matter.

Best wishes,
James
